name: Microwanderer
description:
Here is the first ever prototype of our potential future procedural planet exploration game! Check our latest devlog to know more!

Controls:

  • Movement Mode. Third-person mode which allows the player to move the research probe. The game begins on this mode by default.
    • Move. WASD keys.
    • Switch to Camera Mode. Space key.
  • Camera Mode. First-person mode in which the player sees what the probe's camera sees.
    • Pan Camera. A & D keys.
    • Switch to Movement Mode. Space key.
